name: ShellbotSmart
0:
”Alexa, ask Smart Robot to start cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask Smart Robot to stop cleaning.”
”Alexa, ask Smart Robot to start charging.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart robot
des:
Using Amazon Alexa, the Shellbot Smart skill allows you to interact, monitor and control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner by using voice commands.
To get started, you will need to link your Shellbot Smart skill with your app account.
Once linked, you can use voice commands to control your Robot Vacuum Cleaner.

 For instance, you can try the below voice commands:
Alexa, ask Smart Robot to start cleaning.
Alexa, ask Smart Robot to stop cleaning.
Alexa, ask Smart Robot to start charging.
